ModMetaData.description:
Steam Light
Steam light is a small mod that adds a couple of light fixtures to your game.
- Two kind of table lamps. - Two ceiling lights. - One wall mounted flourescent light. - One tungsten street lamp.
All lights require Electricity research to be built. They can be found in your furniture tab within a dropdown menu.
- REQUIRED MODS
Jecstools The mod requires Jecstools to be able to place lights on the walls and ceilings.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=932008009
- RECOMMENDED MODS
Realistic Darkness Without darkness there can be no light.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1531882210
- Mods being used in preview images. Gloomy's Furniture https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1558635181 It's a beautiful mod that will make your colonies come to life.
Some of my own mods that has not yet been released. ETA When they're somewhat done.
Have fun, hope you'll enjoy.
